testsuite.name: com.tyss.trello.scripts.Trello_TC_04_AddDescription
testsuite.system-out: Login To the App Verify Login In link is Clickable or Not Enter the value into Email Text Box Verify Login with Atlassian Button is Clickable or Not Enter the value into Password Text Box Verify Login Button is Clickable or Not Verify Create New Board Button is Clickable or Not Enter the value into Add Board Title text field Verify Create Board Button is Clickable or Not Verify click to enter the ListName is Clickable or Not Enter the value into Enter List name Verify click to Add List Button is Clickable or Not Verify click to enter the CardName is Clickable or Not Enter the value into Enter List name Verify click to Add Card Button is Clickable or Not mouse hover to the Created Card name Verify click to Pencil Icon is Clickable or Not Verify click to Open Card Button is Clickable or Not Enter the value into Description Text Area Verify Description Save Button is Clickable or Not Description is added Verify Card Close button is Clickable or Not Description is created for a card Verify Title Link is Clickable or Not Verify Logout Button is Clickable or Not
